title: Apostle Islands National Lakeshore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Current Closures  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Current Closures  There are current closures of areas within the Apostle Islands National Lakeshore. Click for more information and see if these closures will affect your trip. more     Information        Telephone System Changes  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Telephone System Changes  Changes are being made to the Park's telephone system. Extension numbers, and prompts will be different than before. This will take effect on Friday the 13th of May. As the new system is implemented you may have difficulties. Thank you for your patience.          Vertical Rub Rails at Park Docks  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Vertical Rub Rails at Park Docks  Vertical rub rails have been installed at most Park docks in order to protect vessels and docks from damage. For more information follow the link to the vertical rub rail guide (PDF, 77kb). more
